resources.string:
"Welcome to Currency Converter!

Currency Converter is a user-friendly application designed to help you convert currencies effortlessly. Whether you're traveling abroad or simply curious about exchange rates, this app provides you with real-time currency conversions based on the rates obtained from the National Bank of Poland (NBP) API.

How it Works:
1. Choose your base currency: Select the currency you wish to convert from the list of available options.
2. Enter the value: Input the amount you want to convert into the designated field.
3. Select the target currency: Choose the currency to which you want to convert your amount.
4. Get instant results: Our app retrieves the latest exchange rates from the NBP API and calculates the converted amount for you.

Please note that the exchange rates are sourced from the NBP, which ensures reliability and accuracy. However, fluctuations in the foreign exchange market may cause slight variations in the displayed rates.

Feel free to explore the app and start converting currencies hassle-free! If you have any questions or feedback, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.

Thank you for choosing Currency Converter!"
